description.brief: Social influence, force of personality, and chaotic persuasion
description.detailed: Charisma represents the capacity to influence others and subtly bend probabilities through presence and inspiration. High Charisma enhances social skills, leadership, and chaos effects.
description.visual_manifestation: Shifting shadows, magnetic aura, magenta highlights

primary_effects: Increases persuasion, leadership, and morale effects
Enhances ally buff potency and cohesion

damage_type_integration.damage_synergy: Chaos and probability-warp techniques scale with Charisma
